thread.title: Mr victor luckauskas
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Mr victor luckauskas

author: Mr victor luckauskas
title: Mr victor luckauskas
text:
we had our new bridgstone set of 4 tyres for our 3 series bmw fitted today on our drive in fulwood in preston, lancashire.
our tyre fitter from WARRINGTON was RYAN T he was very profesional and very freindy and took pride in his work and spent lots of time making everything perfect and explained everything to me,even rang me to say a time in advance of his forthcoming arrival at our home address in preston.
he introduced himself on arrival and asked me if i was happy with everything before i paid.
he is a good and yo should be proud to have him on your pay roll.
we would highly recomend this company to everybody and would use again in the future and the price was a lot cheaper for my choice that tyre centers in preston for same tyre and free fitting and no call out too.
thanks RYAN T for a very possative experiance,
regards victor and wendy
